subject: Accidents and Safety
Automobiles
lead_paragraph: Alabama Coach Nick Saban’s car struck a downed tree this weekend, but he and his wife were not injured in the one-vehicle accident. The Tuscaloosa police said Saban and his wife, Terry, were driving near the entrance of their neighborhood when their car hit the tree. A police spokesman, Capt. Greg Kosloff, said officers arrived on the scene Saturday night and a report was filled out.
